text:
e="preserve">Thomas J. Yewcic (May 9, 1932 – October 21, 2020) was a American football quarterback and punter and Major League Baseball player. In football, he played from 1961 to 1966 with the Boston Patriots of the American Football League (AFL). In baseball, he played one game for the Detroit Tigers in 1957.
Yewcic was born in Conemaugh, Pennsylvania. He died on October 21, 2020 at the age of 88.
